actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study with a view to determining the feasibility of establishing the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of establishing the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historical Trail in the State of California. Authorizes appropriations not to exceed $150,000 to carry out the study authorized by this Act.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study with a view to determining the feasibility of establishing the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail.
